document.full_text: bnp paribas, france's biggest listed bank, beat first-quarter forecasts, driven by strong retail growth and resilient investment banking that bolstered investor confidence and set a high bar for rivals.
document.title: bnp's bumper q1 sets high bar for rivals
lines_and_colors: bnp paribas, france's biggest listed bank, beat first-quarter forecasts, driven by strong retail growth and resilient investment banking that bolstered investor confidence and set a high bar for rivals.
